headline: Ask HN: Is AWS having capacity issues?
description:
I'm trying to launch an instance in AWS. I'm getting "Failed to start the instance i-xxxxxxxx Insufficient capacity." When I try to launch an instance from an AMI, all of the instance types are grayed out. This is happening in both us-east-1 and us-east-2.

Anyone else having the same problem?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: AWS有容量问题吗？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: AWS有容量問題嗎？
description_zh-Hans:
我正试图在AWS中启动一个实例。我得到了 "Failed to start the instance i-xxxxxxxx Insufficient capacity." 当我试图从AMI启动一个实例时，所有的实例类型都是灰色的。这种情况在us-east-1和us-east-2中都有发生。

还有谁有同样的问题？
description_zh-Hant:
我正試圖在AWS中啟動一個實例。我得到了 "Failed to start the instance i-xxxxxxxx Insufficient capacity." 當我試圖從AMI啟動一個實例時，所有的實例類型都是灰色的。這種情況在us-east-1和us-east-2中都有發生。

還有誰有同樣的問題？
